Trade/Device Name(s): AMPLICOR CT/NG test for Chlamydia trachomatis
Roche Scripts for AMPLICOR CT/NG Test Accessory
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AMPLICOR CT/NG test for Chlamydia trachomatis and Roche Scripts accessory for automated sample preparation and DNA detection by PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA in urine (male), endocervical swab (female), and urethral swab (male) using manual or automated preparation, with Roche Scripts for automating swab sample preparation; urine specimens not indicated for automated preparation.
